017
018package org.tquadrat.foundation.inifile;
019
020import static java.lang.Integer.signum;
021import static java.lang.String.format;
022import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
023import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.EMPTY_STRING;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.mapFromNull;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
026
027import java.io.IOException;
028import java.nio.file.Path;
029import java.util.Collection;
030import java.util.Optional;
031import java.util.function.Supplier;
032
033import org.apiguardian.api.API;
034import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
035import org.tquadrat.foundation.inifile.internal.INIFileImpl;
036import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.StringConverter;
037
038/**
039 *  The API for the access to Windows-style configuration files.
040 *
041 *  @note   Changes will not be persisted automatically!
042 *
043 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
044 *  @version $Id: INIFile.java 1105 2024-02-28 12:58:46Z tquadrat $
045 *
046 *  @UMLGraph.link
047 *  @since 0.1.0
048 */
049@SuppressWarnings( "ClassWithTooManyMethods" )
050@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: INIFile.java 1105 2024-02-28 12:58:46Z tquadrat $" )
051@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
052public sealed interface INIFile
053    permits org.tquadrat.foundation.inifile.internal.INIFileImpl
054{
055        /*---------------*\
056    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
057        \*---------------*/
058    /**
059     *  An entry for the INI file.
060     *
061     *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
062     *  @version $Id: INIFile.java 1105 2024-02-28 12:58:46Z tquadrat $
063     *
064     *  @param  group   The group for the entry.
065     *  @param  key The key for the entry.
066     *  @param  value   The entry's value.
067     *
068     *  @UMLGraph.link
069     *  @since 0.1.0
070     */
071    @SuppressWarnings( {"InnerClassOfInterface", "NewClassNamingConvention"} )
072    public record Entry( String group, String key, String value ) implements Comparable<Entry>
073    {
074            /*---------*\
075        ====** Methods **======================================================
076            \*---------*/
077        /**
078         *  {@inheritDoc}
079         *
080         *  @since 0.4.2
081         */
082        @Override
083        @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.2" )
084        public int compareTo( final Entry o )
085        {
086            final Supplier<String> emptyString = () -> EMPTY_STRING;
087            var retValue = signum( mapFromNull( group, emptyString ).compareTo( mapFromNull( o.group, emptyString ) ) );
088            if( retValue == 0 ) retValue = signum( mapFromNull( key, emptyString ).compareTo( mapFromNull( o.key, emptyString ) ) );
089            if( retValue == 0 ) retValue = signum( mapFromNull( value, emptyString ).compareTo( mapFromNull( o.value, emptyString ) ) );
090
091            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
092            return retValue;
093        }   //  compare()
094
095        /**
096         *  {@inheritDoc}
097         */
098        @Override
099        public final String toString() { return format( "%s/%s = %s", group, key, value ); }
100
101        /**
102         *  Retrieves the value and translates it to the desired type.
103         *
104         *  @param  <T> The target type.
105         *  @param  stringConverter The implementation of
106         *      {@link StringConverter}
107         *      that is used to convert the stored value into the target type.
108         *  @return The value; can be {@code null}.
109         */
110        public final <T> T value( final StringConverter<? extends T> stringConverter )
111        {
112            final var retValue = requireNonNullArgument( stringConverter, "stringConverter" ).fromString( value() );
113
114            //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
115            return retValue;
116        }   //  value()
117    }
118    //  record Entry
119
120        /*-----------*\
121    ====** Constants **========================================================
122        \*-----------*/
123    /**
124     *  The line length for an INI file: {@value}.
125     */
126    public static final int LINE_LENGTH = 75;
127
128        /*---------*\
129    ====** Methods **==========================================================
130        \*---------*/
131    /**
132     *  <p>{@summary Adds the given comment to the INI file.}</p>
133     *  <p>The new comment will be appended to an already existing one.</p>
134     *
135     *  @param  comment The comment.
136     */
137    public void addComment( final String comment );
138
139    /**
140     *  <p>{@summary Adds the given comment to the given group.}</p>
141     *  <p>The new comment will be appended to an already existing one.</p>
142     *
143     *  @param  group   The group.
144     *  @param  comment The comment.
145     */
146    public void addComment( final String group, final String comment );
147
148    /**
149     *  <p>{@summary Adds the given comment to the value that is identified by
150     *  the given group and key.}</p>
151     *  <p>The new comment will be appended to an already existing one.</p>
152     *
153     *  @param  group   The group.
154     *  @param  key The key for the value.
155     *  @param  comment The comment.
156     */
157    public void addComment( final String group, final String key, final String comment );
158
159    /**
160     *  <p>{@summary Creates an empty INI file.} If the file already exists, it
161     *  will be overwritten without notice.</p>
162     *  <p>The given file is used to store the value on a call to
163     *  {@link #save()}.</p>
164     *
165     *  @param  file    The file.
166     *  @return The new instance.
167     */
168    public static INIFile create( final Path file ) { return INIFileImpl.create( file ); }
169
170    /**
171     *  Retrieves the value for the given key from the given group.
172     *
173     *  @param  group   The group.
174     *  @param  key The key for the value.
175     *  @return An instance of
176     *      {@link Optional}
177     *      that holds the retrieved value.
178     */
179    public Optional<String> getValue( final String group, final String key );
180
181    /**
182     *  Retrieves the value for the given key from the given group.
183     *
184     *  @param  group   The group.
185     *  @param  key The key for the value.
186     *  @param  defaultValue    The value that will be returned if no other
187     *      value could be found; can be {@code null}.
188     *  @return The value.
189     */
190    public default String getValue( final String group, final String key, final String defaultValue )
191    {
192        final var retValue = getValue( group, key ).orElse( defaultValue );
193
194        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
195        return retValue;
196    }   //  getValue()
197
198    /**
199     *  Retrieves the value for the given key from the given group.
200     *
201     *  @param  <T> The target type.
202     *  @param  group   The group.
203     *  @param  key The key for the value.
204     *  @param  stringConverter The implementation of
205     *      {@link StringConverter}
206     *      that is used to convert the stored value into the target type.
207     *  @return An instance of
208     *      {@link Optional}
209     *      that holds the retrieved value.
210     */
211    public <T> Optional<T> getValue( final String group, final String key, final StringConverter<? extends T> stringConverter );
212
213    /**
214     *  Retrieves the value for the given key from the given group.
215     *
216     *  @param  <T> The target type.
217     *  @param  group   The group.
218     *  @param  key The key for the value.
219     *  @param  stringConverter The implementation of
220     *      {@link StringConverter}
221     *      that is used to convert the stored value into the target type.
222     *  @param  defaultValue    The value that will be returned if no other
223     *      value could be found; can be {@code null}.
224     *  @return The value.
225     */
226    public default <T> T getValue( final String group, final String key, final StringConverter<T> stringConverter, final T defaultValue )
227    {
228        final var retValue = getValue( group, key, stringConverter ).orElse( defaultValue );
229
230        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
231        return retValue;
232    }   //  getValue()
233
234    /**
235     *  <p>{@summary Checks whether the INI file contains a group with the
236     *  given name.}</p>
237     *  <p>This method will not throw an exception for an invalid group name;
238     *  instead it returns {@code false}.</p>
239     *
240     *  @param  group   The group.
241     *  @return {@code true} if there is a group with the given name,
242     *      {@code false} otherwise.
243     */
244    @SuppressWarnings( "BooleanMethodIsAlwaysInverted" )
245    public boolean hasGroup( final String group );
246
247    /**
248     *  <p>{@summary Checks whether the INI file contains an entry with the
249     *  given key.}</p>
250     *  <p>This method will not throw an exception for an invalid group name or
251     *  an invalid key; instead it returns {@code false}.</p>
252     *
253     *  @param  group   The group.
254     *  @param  key The key.
255     *  @return {@code true} if there is an entry with the given key,
256     *      {@code false} otherwise.
257     */
258    @SuppressWarnings( "BooleanMethodIsAlwaysInverted" )
259    public boolean hasValue( final String group, final String key );
260
261    /**
262     *  Returns all entries of the INI file.
263     *
264     *  @return The entries.
265     */
266    public Collection<Entry> listEntries();
267
268    /**
269     *  Loads the entries for the INI file.
270     *
271     *  @param  entries The entries.
272     */
273    public default void loadEntries( final Entry... entries )
274    {
275        for( final var entry : requireNonNullArgument( entries, "entries" ) )
276        {
277            setValue( entry.group(), entry.key(), entry.value() );
278        }
279    }   //  loadEntries()
280
281    /**
282     *  Loads the entries for the INI file.
283     *
284     *  @param  entries The entries.
285     */
286    public default void loadEntries( final Collection<Entry> entries )
287    {
288        loadEntries( entries.toArray( Entry []::new ) );
289    }   //  loadEntries()
290
291    /**
292     *  Opens the given INI file and reads its contents. If the file does not
293     *  exist yet, a new, empty file will be created.
294     *
295     *  @param  file    The file.
296     *  @return The new instance.
297     *  @throws IOException A problem occurred when reading the file.
298     */
299    public static INIFile open( final Path file ) throws IOException { return INIFileImpl.open( file ); }
300
301    /**
302     *  Re-reads the values.
303     *
304     *  @throws IOException A problem occurred when reading the file.
305     */
306    public void refresh() throws IOException;
307
308    /**
309     *  Saves the contents of the INI file to the file that was provided to
310     *  {@link #create(Path)}
311     *  or
312     *  {@link #open(Path)}.
313     *  This method has to be called to persist any changes made to the
314     *  contents of the INI file.
315     *
316     *  @throws IOException  A problem occurred when writing the contents to
317     *      the file.
318     */
319    public void save() throws IOException;
320
321    /**
322     *  <p>{@summary Sets the given comment to the INI file.}</p>
323     *  <p>The new comment will replace any already existing comment.</p>
324     *
325     *  @param  comment The comment.
326     *
327     *  @since 0.4.3
328     */
329    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.3" )
330    public void setComment( final String comment );
331
332    /**
333     *  <p>{@summary Sets the given comment to the given group.}</p>
334     *  <p>The new comment will replace any already existing comment.</p>
335     *
336     *  @param  group   The group.
337     *  @param  comment The comment.
338     *
339     *  @since 0.4.3
340     */
341    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.3" )
342    public void setComment( final String group, final String comment );
343
344    /**
345     *  <p>{@summary Sets the given comment to the value that is identified by
346     *  the given group and key.}</p>
347     *  <p>The new comment will replace any already existing comment.</p>
348     *
349     *  @param  group   The group.
350     *  @param  key The key for the value.
351     *  @param  comment The comment.
352     *
353     *  @since 0.4.3
354     */
355    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.3" )
356    public void setComment( final String group, final String key, final String comment );
357
358    /**
359     *  Stores the given value with the given key to the given group.
360     *
361     *  @param  group   The group.
362     *  @param  key The key.
363     *  @param  value   The value.
364     */
365    public void setValue( final String group, final String key, final String value );
366
367    /**
368     *  Stores the given value with the given key to the given group.
369     *
370     *  @param  <S> The source type for the value.
371     *  @param  group   The group.
372     *  @param  key The key.
373     *  @param  value   The value.
374     *  @param  stringConverter The instance of
375     *      {@link StringConverter}
376     *      that is used to convert the value to a String.
377     */
378    public default <S> void setValue( final String group, final String key, final S value, final StringConverter<S> stringConverter )
379    {
380        setValue( group, key, requireNonNullArgument( stringConverter, "stringConverter" ).toString( value ) );
381    }   //  setValue()
382}
383//  interface INIFile
384
385/*
386 *  End of File
387 */
